title: Bag, 1800–50
medium:
Medium: silk, birch bark, grass stems
Technique: painted silk plain weave; birch bark embroidered with stem, satin and knot stitches using dyed grass stems
creditline: Gift of Mrs. William P. Treadwell
description: White silk bag with a panel of birch bark applied to one side, embroidered with a garland of flowers. The other side embroidered with a female figure churning butter?

tombstone.epitaph:
Bag, 1800–50.
1800–50. Medium: silk, birch bark, grass stems
Technique: painted silk plain weave; birch bark embroidered with stem, satin and knot stitches using dyed grass stems. Gift of Mrs. William P. Treadwell. 1916-33-12.
